title: Odallus: The Dark Call (v2.5.0.7) [GOG]
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_odallus_the_dark_call_2.5.0.7.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS GAME! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Changelog for Patch 1.1.1 / GOG-7 (Windows) (added 09 August 2016): 

- fixed the pause selection weapon problem. 
- fixed the enemy blocks that doesn't disappear after defeating the area enemy. 
- fixed the soft lock on minecart levels after falling from the minecart. 
- some graphical elements changed 
- fixed problem with boat in veteran mode that sometimes become invisible. 

Changelog for Patch 1.1.0 FIX / GOG-6 (added 18 November 2015): 

- This update fixes the Deeds not showing up in the DRM free version for some players. 


Changelog for Patch 1.1.0 / GOG-5 (Windows) (added 17 November 2015): 

- Added "Veteran Mode" a new difficulty mode available after beating the game for the first time. 
- Added Hungarian language support 


Changelog for Patch 1.0.4 / GOG-4 (Windows) (added 20 August 2015): 

- We had to make big changes in the dialogue system in order to fix crashes that some people were experiencing. 
- We changed everything to xml and replaced the whole dialogue system by a new one. 

General changes and fixes: 

- dialogue with bosses can be skipped pressing "START" 
- salesman added in Gael`s Castle 
- final boss form 1 and 2 make less damage 
- dark armor fire barrier spawn time decreased 
- dark armor need 10 weapon units instead of 5 
- fixed camera bug in frozen mines 
- fixed axe charged attack bug 
- fixed devil`s peak boss bug 
- Russian language added (by Prometheus Project) 
- general fixes in portuguese script (by Hugo Varani) 
- fixed collision in moving platforms when frame rate is below 50 
- fixed long load times that some were experiencing 


Changelog for Patch 1.0.3 / GOG-3 (Windows) (added 23 July 2015): 

- Aqueducts 2 boat finally fixed. 
- Aqueducts 1 boss fixed. 
- Ending achievements fixed. 
- M.I.S. option added (disable only if you have any problems with this new build) 
- Launcher crashes fixed. 


Changelog for Patch 1.0.1-fix-2 / GPG-2 (Windows) (added 17 July 2015): 

- Fixes the leaderboard function via the game's launcher.

About:
The old gods have forgotten this land. No one could save our people when darkness started spreading and collecting human souls for its army. Odallus is a classic exploration/action game, inspired by Ghostsâ€™n Goblins, Demonâ€™s Crest and Castlevania. Player takes place of Haggis, a warrior tired of fight who must wield his sword once more to rescue his son from Darkness.
Eight levels open to exploration
Stunning 8-bit graphics
Dark fantasy atmosphere
4+ hours of gameplay
50+ types of enemies

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1ghz or equivalent 
Memory: 2 GB RAM
